freenet.client.async
Interface DBJob

All Known Implementing Classes:
PersistentStatsPutter, SegmentedBucketChainBucketKillJob
public interface DBJob

A job to be run on the database thread. We will pass a transactional context in, and a ClientContext.

Author:
toad

Method Summary
 boolean run(com.db4o.ObjectContainer container, ClientContext context)
          A database job runs on the database thread.
 

Method Detail

run

boolean run(com.db4o.ObjectContainer container,
            ClientContext context)
A database job runs on the database thread. You may only access the database from the database thread.

Parameters:
container - The database. Must be passed around because we can only access it from the database thread. If you switch to another thread, you must schedule a new database job if you want to access the database again at a later point.
context - The client context. Essential but mostly non-persistent objects, including the DBJobRunner with which to schedule more database jobs.
Returns:
True if we must commit the transaction immediately e.g. due to it likely using lots of memory. Otherwise we aggregate them based on time.
